segments.text: Are you excited about your trip next month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes and no . I can ' t wait to go to Europe , but at the same time I am terrified .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have acrophobia . I have a chronic fear of flying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh really ? I have an uncle who is also terrified of flying . It ' s not that bad though , I mean , it is pretty scary to be in this big machine flying through the air at seven hundred miles per hour . I actually have arachnophobia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ' re scared of spiders ? I actually have two more phobias . Acrophobia and glossophobia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that explains why you are afraid of flying , but public speaking is not that bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? When I get on stage , my palms start to sweat , I get really nervous and I can hardly speak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I must confess I am a bit claustrophobic . I hate being in an elevator for more than 5 seconds .
segments.speaker: S1
